page.title: 07DORKING OPEN AIR MARKET
page.content: Most people went to the market on a regular basis and the majority agreed that it was cheeper than the shops,but,the items were often not as good quality.The most common things that were bought were fruit and vegetables. We interviewed the stallholders, they were asked: Do you only go to Dorking ? If not,where else ? Is Dorking good for business ? Where do you live ? We found that most of the holders travelled to other markets,some very far away.eg Chichester,Canterbury and Oxford. A good half of those we interviewed lived up to fifty miles away and agreed that Dorking provided good enough business to make the journey worth while.
